wp-syntax test

Just testing out wp-syntax highlighting, and demoing it for some friends. Colorful ruby code!

require "date"

class DateReformatter
  attr_reader :date
  
  def initialize(date)
    self.date = date
  end
  
  def date=(date)
    begin
      @date = DateTime::parse(date)
    rescue
      @date = DateTime::now()
    end
  end
  
  def reformat
    local = DateTime.now()
    utc = @date.new_offset
    local_from_utc = utc.new_offset(local.offset)
    local_from_utc.to_s
    "#{pad(local_from_utc.hour)}:#{pad(local_from_utc.min)}"
  end
  
  private
  
  def pad(num)
    num.to_s.rjust(2, '0')
  end
end

—May 04, 2009
